summary: From the land far North, eyes that gaze at the Gods.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/modimages/eyesofnors.png[/img]

[img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/modimages/eyesofnorsebanner.png[/img]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/DHCpmWV.png[/img]


This Eye pack offers you many new eyes textures for your character and future follower.
All texture are HD and have will really make you look unique.

Want a close up , [url=http://sta.sh/011rhc4lcd6b][u][b]click here.
[/b][/u][/url]
[size=4][u][b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=947502831]STEAM VERSION RIGHT HERE[/url][/b][/u][/size]


[color=#b6d7a8]Mer coming soon... [/color]

[color=#fff2cc][size=5]HOW TO INSTALL:[/size][/color]
- Manual = Copy the content into DATA folder.
- Use Nexus Mod Manager for auto-install


[color=#d5a6bd][size=4]BUGS :[/size][/color]
All eyes are black, then you must loot or have installed them incorrectly.


[size=4][b]PERMISSION:[/b][/size]

- My mods are free to use as a resource for followers, but you must credit me.
- You are allowed to add them on other sites, if credit is given and a link back here.
- I DO NOT ALLOW THEM TO BE SOLD, or to be used for Creation club.
- DO NOT ALTER THEM.



[size=5][b][color=#cc4125]OTHER EYE MODS:[/color][/b][/size]



[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75857/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75857/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75857/?][img]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/modimages/EYES%20OF%20FAY.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76071/?][img width=493,height=161]https://m-master.000webhostapp.com/modimages/eyesofvalen.png[/img]


[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76071/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76071/?]
[/url]


[color=#b4a7d6][size=5]BIG THANK YOU TO THE FACEBOOK GROUP " Skyrim Mods & Modders"
[/size][/color]

author: MassiveMaster
